</title>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 104 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 70,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Crafted from flawless jade, the guard of this [rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36) takes the form of a twisting serpent with the blade thrusting from its open mouth. This rapier functions as a _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [speed](/Equipment.aspx?ID=304) rapier_. While wielding the rapier, your movement doesn't trigger reactions when you Stride, [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28), or [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29). When you invest the rapier, you either increase your Dexterity score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever is higher.
